t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    H = l[0]
    x = l[1]
    y = l[2]
    C = l[3]
    if H * (x + y // 2) > C:
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (h, x, y, c) = map(int, input().split())
    print('YES') if (x + y // 2) * h <= c else print('NO')

import math
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (H, X, Y, C) = map(int, input().split())
    n1 = math.floor(Y / 2)
    n2 = n1 + X
    n3 = H * n2
    if n3 <= C:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (H, x, y, C) = map(int, input().split())
    grey_water = x + int(y / 2)
    gray_water_consumption = grey_water * H
    print('YES') if gray_water_consumption <= C else print('NO')
